Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for us and has been meticulously designed to cater to your needs. Given its exceptional quality and features, we believe it's worth more than what others might be willing to pay. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. If you decide to purchase this product, you can do so for $12,000. This special price reflects our confidence in its value and our desire to ensure you receive the best possible deal. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding with this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
